price: ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߏ߬ߙߌ߬ ߟߴߊ߲ ߢߊߞߘߐ߫ ߞߵߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ߘߌ߫ ߡߐ߰ ߥߊߟߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲ߓߊߟߌ ߦߋ߫
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
